mapper.insert: insert into oa_express (EXPID, EXPARRIVED, EXCID, ORDID) VALUES (#{expid},#{isArrived}, #{expressCompany.id}, #{order.id})
mapper.update: update oa_express set EXPARRIVED = #{isArrived}, EXCID=#{expressCompany.id}, ORDID=#{order.id} where EXPID = #{expid}
mapper.select: select exp.*, exc.* from oa_express exp inner join oa_expresscompany exc on exp.EXCID=exc.EXCID
select exp.*, ord.* from oa_express exp inner join oa_order ord on exp.ORDID=exc.ORDID
select exp.*, ord.* from oa_express exp inner join oa_order ord on exp.ORDID=exc.ORDID inner join oa_expresscompany exc on exp.EXCID=exc.EXCID
select exp.*, exc.* from oa_express exp inner join oa_expresscompany exc on exp.EXCID=exc.EXCID limit #{start}, #{rows}
select exp.*, ord.* from oa_express exp inner join oa_order ord on exp.ORDID=exc.ORDID limit #{start}, #{rows}
select exp.*, ord.* from oa_express exp inner join oa_order ord on exp.ORDID=exc.ORDID inner join oa_expresscompany exc on exp.EXCID=exc.EXCID limit #{start}, #{rows}

select count(*) from oa_express where
EXPARRIVED = #{isArrived}
